definitions.definition: In various sports, a block that prevents an opponent from scoring.
definitions.example: The goaltender made a great save.

definitions.definition: When a relief pitcher comes into a game leading by 3 points (runs) or less, and his team wins while continually being ahead.
definitions.example: Jones retired seven to earn the save.

definitions.definition: A point in a professional wrestling match when one or more wrestlers run to the ring to aid a fellow wrestler who is being beaten.
definitions.example: The giant wrestler continued to beat down his smaller opponent, until several wrestlers ran in for the save.

definitions.definition: The act, process, or result of saving data to a storage medium.
definitions.example: If you're hit by a power cut, you'll lose all of your changes since your last save.
